items.longDescription:
- Jersey material with a crisp woven look.
- Pull-on waist design makes them comfortable and easy to wear.
- Relaxed fit, streamlined ankle length pants that taper towards the hem.
- Casual design that is perfect for wearing out and about.
items.name: MEN Washed Jersey Ankle Pants
items.shortDescription: Versatile colors and workwear-style details.

items.longDescription:
- Incredibly quick-drying DRY-EX fabric.
- Cotton-like, casual look.
items.name: MEN Dry-EX Crew Neck Short Sleeve T-Shirt
items.shortDescription: Our quick-drying T-shirt keeps you feeling fresh. Cotton-look fabric for a casual style.

items.longDescription:
- Groundbreaking DRY-EX material dries sweat and moisture incredibly quickly. We’ve added anti-microbial and anti-odor properties to keep you feeling fresh even in sweaty situations.
- We performed a data analysis of indigo dyeing and mudding, which are Japanese traditional crafts, and faithfully reproduced the color for the print.
- A gusset under the sleeve makes for easier movement in every direction.
- Silhouette that is easy to wear not only for sports but also for casual situations.
items.name: MEN DRY-EX Printed Crew Neck Short Sleeve T-Shirt
items.shortDescription: Incredibly quick-drying, smooth, and feels fresh. The perfect fit for every situation with carefully selected coloring.

items.longDescription:
- Made with two-way stretch fabric.
- Center crease with a shape-retaining resin finish.
- Wrinkle-resistant for easy care.
- The fabric stretches in all directions for comfort even when bending the knee.
- The wool-like texture is perfect for business wear.
- Slim pants with a tapered, ankle-length cut.
- Easy waist design for comfort.
- The elastic waistband is covered with the same fabric as the pants for a refined look.
- Updated with hook fasteners at the front for a sleeker look.
items.name: MEN Smart Ankle Trousers
items.shortDescription: Comfortable pants with a premium look. A versatile wardrobe essential.

items.longDescription:
- Made with two-way stretch fabric.
- Now with seam pockets for cleaner lines.
- Stretch cotton twill fabric with incredible stretch both horizontally and vertically.
- Comfortable fit even when you bend your knees.
- Cotton twill fabric with a high threadcount for a smooth texture that goes great with dressy styles.
- Slim pants with a tapered, ankle-length cut.
- Easy waist design for comfort.
- The elastic waistband is covered with the same fabric as the pants for a refined look.

items.shortDescription: Cotton fabric in an updated design. Versatile pants for any occasion.

items.longDescription:
- The shorter length creates a more balanced look when untucked.
- 100％ extra-fine cotton with ultra-long fibers.
- Durable fabric with a glossy sheen.
- Special pre-wash process for an extra soft feel.
- The thread count has been specially calibrated for each color and pattern.
- Regular straight fit is sleek yet unrestrictive.
- We’ve used two types of interlining in the collar for a crisp look and a soft feel.
- The placket is made of soft interlining fabric, and the cuffs are made of firm interlining fabric.
- Flat felled seams at the armholes and underarms for minimal skin contact.

items.longDescription:
- Uses quick-drying AIRism.
- Lengthened the sleeves for a streamlined silhouette.
- Changed to a finer filament thread for the stitching on the outside to match the fabric.
- Provides UV protection.
- Reduced seams for a cleaner look.
- Smooth, quick-drying AIRism feels cool to the touch.
- Elegant fine stripes.
- Minimal fly front thanks to a hidden placket.
items.name: MEN AIRism Fly Front Polo Short Sleeve Shirt
items.shortDescription: Silky and refreshing. A hidden placket creates a cleaner look.

items.longDescription:
- Made with 2-way fabric that stretches vertically and horizontally.
- Won’t wrinkle even after washing.
- This item provides stress-free comfort, even when you bend your knees.
- New hidden elastic waist. Looks great with your shirt tucked in.
- Meticulous stitching ensures reduced wrinkling.
- A slender, slim-fit tapered cut in a perfect ankle length.
- The center pleats and wool-like texture work for both formal and informal occasions.
- Classy striped pattern.
items.name: MEN Smart Ankle Pants 2Way Stretch (Stripe)
items.shortDescription: Wear for work or for lounging at home. Versatile and comfy pants that can be styled in many different ways.

items.longDescription:

items.name: AIRism Bedsheet (Queen)
items.shortDescription: For a cool, comfortable night’s sleep.

Machine wash cold, gentle cycle
Do not tumble dry

items.longDescription:
- Made from 100% ultra-long staple cotton with a soft, glossy look and durable design.
- Particular attention has been given to the threads, which are light with moderate thickness for a balanced casual look.
- This season’s updates include a straight silhouette that makes use of the draping feel of the fabric.
- This item has a well-balanced silhouette that is thin and easy to move around in but looks neat.
- This one-wash item has a brushed feel, and has undergone special press-processing for wrinkle-resistance.
- Adjusted the balance of the collar tip and the collar height, and used a firm neck for the base collar and a soft core fabric for the upper collar to create a perfect fit.
- The placket is made of soft interlining fabric, and the cuffs are made of firm interlining fabric.
- By focusing on the number of stitches, this item has a more beautiful pattern and the collar, placket, and pocket patterns also match. The color of the stitches and button holes have been carefully selected.
- The arm holes and the underside have a beautiful finish and are folded-down so that it does not touch your skin.
- This item can be used for any occasion and is great for day-to-day coordination.
items.name: MEN Extra Fine Cotton Broadcloth Long Sleeve Shirt
items.shortDescription: Improved to provide a more trendy straight silhouette. Less brushing for more beautiful colors and patterns.

items.longDescription:
- Made from 100% ultra-long cotton fibers with a soft, glossy look and durable design.
- An item that balances both a casual and high-quality look.
- This season’s updates include a straight silhouette that makes use of the draping feel of the material.
- This item has a well-balanced silhouette that is thin and easy to move around in but looks sleek.
- This single-wash item has a brushed feel, and has undergone special processing for wrinkle-resistance.
- Adjusted the balance of the collar and used a firm neck for the base collar with a soft core fabric for the upper collar to create a perfect fit.
- The placket is made of soft interlining fabric, and the cuffs are made of firm interlining fabric.
- By reducing the number of stitches, this item has a more beautiful pattern and the collar, placket, and pocket patterns also match. The color of the stitches and button holes have been carefully selected.
- The armholes and the underside have a beautiful finish and are folded down so that it does not touch your skin.
items.name: MEN Extra Fine Cotton Broadcloth Long Sleeve Shirt
items.shortDescription: Improved to provide a more on-trend straight silhouette. Less brushing for more beautiful colors and patterns.

items.longDescription:

- Easy care minimizes wrinkles and makes ironing easier.
- The wool-like texture makes it suitable workwear.
- The elastic in the waist is completely covered with the same fabric as the pants for a neat, tucked-in impression.
- Center crease maintain crispness even after washing.
- Attention has been paid to the beautiful finish with selective sewing techniques.
- Provides a slender and tapered cut in a perfect ankle length.
items.name: MEN Smart Ankle Pants
items.shortDescription: The elastic around the waist is hidden for a clean look. Provides an elevated but is still easy to wear.

items.longDescription:
- Groundbreaking DRY-EX material quickly dries sweat and moisture.
- Refined fabrics and a clean silhouette make this shirt a good choice.
- The hem is narrow, so it's roomy, but it's also comfortable, and is great for an active lifestyle.
- It's finished with elastic around the waist and snap buttons at the front for a laid-back look and flat-knit comfort.
items.name: EZY Jogger Trousers
items.shortDescription: It looks neat and clean. High-performance fabric and an uneven hem for a sporty look.

items.longDescription:

items.longDescription:

items.shortDescription: It looks neat and clean. Enhanced the materials and cut for added comfort.

items.longDescription:

- Easy care prevents wrinkles from washing and makes ironing easier.

items.longDescription:
- The Uniqlo U collection is the realization of a dedicated and skilled team of international designers based at our Paris Research and Development Center led by Artistic Director Christophe Lemaire.
- Made from 50% nylon recycled from UNIQLO down products donated by customers and staff.
- Sustainable design.
- Features a fitted cut and meticulous attention to detail.
- A versatile, unisex layering piece.
- Updated shoulder design.
- Developed with recycled down as part of our sustainability efforts.
items.name: MEN Recycled Down Jacket
